name: Architecture Blueprint
prompt: (floor plan: 1.1) architectural sketch style {prompt} . blueprint, oblique, draft, grayscale, flat, scale bars, monochromatic, annotation, hatching

name: Architecture Isometric Pencil Sketch
prompt: (isometric: 1.1) architectural sketch style {prompt} . blueprint style, draft, hand-drawn, grayscale, flat, monochromatic, hatching
negative_prompt: photo, realistic, messy, 3d model, hand, pencil, watermark

name: Architecture Isometric Watercolor Sketch
prompt: (isometric: 1.1) architectural sketch style {prompt} . draft, hand-drawn, watercolor, flat, hatching
negative_prompt: photo, messy, 3d model, hand, pencil, watermark

name: Architecture Presentation
prompt: high-quality architecture presentation {prompt} . 3D rendering, CAD, Octane renderer, 8k

name: Landscape Plan
prompt: sketch style landscape plan, (site analysis:1.2), {prompt} (plan view:1.2), draft, hand-drawn, flat, hatching
negative_prompt: pencil, hand, messy, 3D model, photo, realistic, brush, isometric, perpective, text

name: Mechanical Sketch
prompt: sketch style mechanical drawing {prompt} . technical documentation, flat, greyscale, hatching, annotation
negative_prompt: photo, realistic, messy, 3d model, hand, pencil, watermark, isometric

name: Mechanical CAD
prompt: mechanical drawing style {prompt}. exploded drawing, technical documentation, CAD, monochromatic
